goals__remit: Business Development Group aims to initiate, start and develop innovative actions, platforms and cooperation consortia in the field of water, energy efficiency and circular economy with focus on East- Western Europe cooperation.BDGroup will strive to reduce the gap on innovative solutions and projects in Eastern Europe.
